Save a generated report file in the report folder with the appropriate name

save_report_file.Rd

Save a generated report file in the report folder with the appropriate name

save_report_file(report_tbl, report_folder, filename)

Arguments

report_tbl

the report tibble
report_folder

the report folder
filename

the name of the file
